root.name: WWF Super Wrestlemania
root.description: OverviewWWF Super Wrestlemania was the first Licensed WWF game for both the SNES and Genesis consoles. Both versions of the game featured three modes of play: one on one match, tag team match, and Survivor Series. Both versions of the game featured mostly different rosters of playable wrestlers. WWF Super Wrestlemania supports 1 or 2 players.
